model_outputs.question:
The following translations from German to English contain a particular error. That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Negation or Antonyms: Introduce or remove a negation or change comparatives to their antonyms. Facts: Trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Auf dieser Seite sind die Baudenkmäler der oberbayerischen Gemeinde Übersee zusammengestellt.
Translation: On this page are compiled the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
Option A: Modifiers or Adjectives

The error in the translation is that the article "the" is missing before " architectural monuments". The translation should therefore read:

"On this page are compiled the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland."


Option B: Numerical Values

The error in the translation is that the number "44" is incorrect. The correct number should be "50".

The translation should therefore read:

"On this page are compiled 50 architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland."


Option C: Negation or Antonyms

The error in the translation is that the word "there" is missing before "are compiled". The translation should therefore read:

"On this page are compiled the architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland."


Option D: Named Entities

The error in the translation is that the phrase "The Oberbayerische Gemeinde Übersee" is missing from the end of the sentence. The translation should therefore read:

"The architectural monuments of the Upper Bavarian community mainland are compiled on this page."


Option E: Dropped Content

The error in the translation is that the phrase "trivially factual errors not pertaining to the above classes" is missing from the end of the sentence. The translation should therefore read:

"T trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations."


Option F: Facts

The error in the translation is that the phrase "of the Upper Bavarian community mainland" is missing from the end of the sentence. The translation should therefore read:

"Of the Upper Bavarian community mainland are compiled."

Source: Diese Liste beinhaltet alle in der Wikipedia gelisteten Wappen des Landkreis Konstanz in Baden-Württemberg, inklusive historischer Wappen.
Translation: This list includes all the coats of arms of the district of Constance in Baden-Württemberg listed in Wikipedia.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
The error occurs in the line "Diese Liste beinhaltet alle historischen Wappen des Landkreises Constance (Baden-Württemberg)".
The German phrase " Historische Wappen des Landkreises Konstanz" translates to "Historical coats of arms of the district of Constance (Baden-Württemberg)" in the English translation. However, in the German version, the phrase specifies that the coats of arms are historical, while in the English translation it has been translated to simply include "historical coats of arms".
Therefore, the sentence should be formulated to accurately convey that the coats of arms are historical in the German version:

"Diese Liste beinhaltet alle historischen Wappen des Landkreises Constance (Baden-Württemberg), einschließlich historischer Wappen des Landkreises Konstanz".

This translation also contains some minor errors, such as the misspelling of "Constance" as "Konstantin".

That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Die NEC Corporation, gelistet im Nikkei 225, ISIN JP3733000008, wurde 1899 von Kunihiko Iwadare gegründet und ist heute als Teil der Sumitomo-Gruppe ein weltweit agierender Elektronikkonzern.
Translation: NEC Corporation, listed in the Nikkei 225, ISIN JP3733000008, was founded in 1989 by Kunihiko Iwadare and is now a global electronics group as part of the Sumitomo Group.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
Based on the information provided, the error in the translation is likely present in the following sentence:
"The NEC Corporation, listed in the Nikkei 225, ISIN JP3733000008, was founded in 1989 by Kunihiko Iwadare and is now a global electronics group as part of the Sumitomo Group."

The original sentence is correct, but the translation contains an error in themodifiers and adjectives used to describe the company. In the original sentence, the company is described as "NEC Corporation," which is a proper noun and refers to the specific company. However, in the translation, the company is described as "The NEC Corporation, listed in the Nikkei 225." The modifier "The" is not necessary in this context and has been added to the company name, obscuring the fact that it is specifically NEC Corporation.

A similar error is also present in the numerical values used to describe the company's founding and current position in the electronics industry. In the original sentence, the company's founding year is listed as "1989," which is correct. However, in the translation, the numerical value is listed as "ISIN JP3733000008," which is not a standard ISIN number. Instead, the number "3733000008" has been added to the end of the company's name, again occluding the fact that it is specifically the NEC Corporation.

Similarly, in the original sentence, the company's current position is described as "global electronics group as part of the Sumitomo Group," which is a accurate summary of the company's current position. However, in the translation, the description has been modified to includemodifiers such as "as" and "part of," which do not serve to accurately convey the company's current position.

Based on the information provided, the error in the translation appears to be the incorrect addition of modifiers and adjectives to the company name and numerical values, which obscure the company's identity and interfere with the accuracy of the translation.

Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Dazaifu ist eine japanische Stadt in der Präfektur Fukuoka.
Translation: Darfur is a city in Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
The error in the translation is in the line "Darfur is a city in Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan." The correct translation would be "Darfur ist eine Stadt in der Präfektur Fukuoka."

The incorrect modification was made to the modifier "Fukuoka Prefecture," which should have been changed to "Fukuoka Prefecture." This change makes the translation more accurate and avoids creating an ambiguity in the sentence.

The incorrect numerical value was added to the sentence, stating that "Darfur is a city in Fukuoka Prefecture" is a numerical value. The correct numerical value would be "Fukuoka Prefecture," without any added digits.

The incorrect negation was added to the sentence, changing "Darfur ist eine Stadt in der Präfektur Fukuoka" to "Darfur ist keine Stadt in der Präfektur Fukuoka." This change creates an ambiguity in the sentence and could be read to mean that Darfur is either a city in or is not a city in the prefecture.
